sentence: For example, many would agree with Representative Liz Cheney when she says, I'm a constitutional conservative, and I do not recognize those in my party who have abandoned the Constitution to embrace Donald Trump.? It is a strategy that conservative politicians like Cheney might see an independent presidential campaign, working in alliance with the Libertarian Party, as necessary to restore the Republican Party.
title: Should Fear Mike Pence  as a Libertarian Presidential Candidate
